title: Manpower Matchmaker
summary: A platform that connects companies with skilled/unskilled workers based on job requirements. Built a workerâ€“employer matching system for efficient hiring with dashboards for worker listing, tracking, and subscription management.

title: MediConnect
summary: A digital solution enabling remote doctor consultation and smart EHR access. Implemented secure EHR system for storing patient medical history, integrated video-based remote doctor appointments, and introduced the concept of 'Doctors Work From Home' for flexible healthcare.

title: WearYourBond
summary: A pastel-themed Gen-Z friendly website for designing and previewing personalized T-shirts. Built customization features for text, colors, and design themes, created a clean aesthetic UI inspired by modern Instagram brands, and designed backend workflow for handling custom orders.
